meta.job_title: Regional Property Manager, Multifamily ( Los Angeles)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute business plan strategies for an assigned portfolio of properties.
Directly oversee Property Managers and Area Managers, providing mentorship and guidance.
Review and approve property purchasing and marketing budgets for the properties.
Engage in revenue management pricing and review survey results to create action plans for improvement.
Ensure property staff are utilizing front-end technology and systems as intended.
Oversight of property risk management, safety standards, and liability for team members and residents.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree preferred, Real Estate License required
